data.name: Idyllic Town
data.description: A corner of a rural town that follows after the style of Springvale.\nAmong the many praises that visitors sing of Springvale, "a relaxing environment" and "a comfortable lifestyle" stand out. But of course, these tourists largely stay in Springvale for but a short while. Long-term living in these places requires such skills as hunting and farming. Only by mastering such skills can one truly keep up with the locals' lifestyle, appreciate the gifts of nature, and enjoy Springvale's breezes and idylls.

text.text: Sometimes, I want to visit. If you are here, I am... not scared.
Newcomers who are learning how to use wind gliders will practice simple exercises in Springvale.
Most of the buildings in Springvale only have two or three floors, which is an ideal height for those still getting accustomed to gliding.
However, please remember to glide legally! The rules also apply here.
Oh, how familiar... This place is very similar to my hometown.
But you don't have any bars and drunkards here, right?
Purrfect, hehe! I'll find a room to settle down in!
